results.description: SELECT * FROM cases WHERE user_id = 1 AND status = 'active'
results.queryPlan: SEARCH cases USING INDEX idx_cases_user_status (user_id=? AND status=?)

results.description: SELECT * FROM cases ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 20
SELECT c.*, COUNT(e.id) FROM cases c LEFT JOIN evidence e ON c.id = e.case_id GROUP BY c.id
results.queryPlan: SCAN c | SEARCH e USING COVERING INDEX idx_evidence_case_id (case_id=?) LEFT-JOIN

results.description: SELECT * FROM evidence WHERE case_id = 1 AND evidence_type = 'document'
results.queryPlan: SEARCH evidence USING INDEX idx_evidence_case_type (case_id=? AND evidence_type=?)

results.description: SELECT * FROM timeline_events WHERE user_id = 1 AND case_id = 1
results.queryPlan: SEARCH timeline_events USING INDEX idx_timeline_user_case (user_id=? AND case_id=?)

results.description: SELECT * FROM actions WHERE case_id = 1 AND status IN ('pending', 'in_progress')
results.queryPlan: SEARCH actions USING INDEX idx_actions_case_status (case_id=? AND status=?)

results.description: SELECT * FROM actions WHERE case_id = 1 AND due_date > date('now') ORDER BY due_date
results.queryPlan: SEARCH actions USING INDEX idx_actions_case_due_date (case_id=? AND due_date>?)

results.description: SELECT * FROM chat_messages WHERE conversation_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT c.*, e.id, t.id, a.id, n.id FROM cases c LEFT JOIN evidence e, timeline_events t, actions a, notes n
results.queryPlan: SEARCH c USING INDEX idx_cases_user_id (user_id=?) | SEARCH e USING COVERING INDEX idx_evidence_case_id (case_id=?) LEFT-JOIN | SEARCH t USING COVERING INDEX idx_timeline_events_case_id (case_id=?) LEFT-JOIN | SEARCH a USING COVERING INDEX idx_actions_case_id (case_id=?) LEFT-JOIN | SEARCH n USING COVERING INDEX idx_notes_case_id (case_id=?) LEFT-JOIN | USE TEMP B-TREE FOR count(DISTINCT) | USE TEMP B-TREE FOR count(DISTINCT) | USE TEMP B-TREE FOR count(DISTINCT) | USE TEMP B-TREE FOR count(DISTINCT)

results.description: SELECT * FROM sessions WHERE expires_at < datetime('now')
SELECT * FROM user_facts WHERE user_id = 1 AND case_id = 1
